job_description:
Position: Sr. Software Developer

Location: Toronto, ON (Hybrid)

Work type: Hybrid Candidate is required to come in office 3 days a week.

Duration: 138 Business Days (Extension Possible)

Description
Creation of technical specifications for systems development
Design, implement and work with the project team in completing all relevant and required documentation in
alignment with OPS standards
Undertake special assignments/sub-projects as assigned
Software code
Support the testing team during system and UAT testing
Participate in Knowledge transfer
Knowledge of IBM ACE
.Net framework
Web services, JSON, XML
IBM ACE software

Proven track record of delivering solutions based on IBM platform.

Technical Skills
Net, JSON, web services, XML
Programming languages, Common operating systems, Software proficiency

Must Haves

8+ years of experience as a Software Developer

Proven track record of delivering solutions based on IBM platform.

Technically skilled in .Net, JSON, web services, XML
